reviews.comment:
Just had the most incredible PRP treatment at Cocoon Medical Spa in Canggu and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the experience! I booked the full-face, neck, and chest PRP session and was so impressed with the professionalism, cleanliness, and care from start to finish.

The staff made me feel completely at ease ‚Äî they explained every step of the process in detail and were so gentle during the treatment. My practitioner was skilled, precise, and clearly experienced in PRP, which made me feel completely safe and relaxed throughout.

What made it even better? The soothing LED light therapy mask at the end ‚Äî the perfect way to finish off such a rejuvenating session. My skin already feels firmer and more radiant, and I can‚Äôt wait to see the results over the next few weeks.

Highly recommend Cocoon to anyone looking for advanced aesthetic treatments with a touch of luxury. I‚Äôll definitely be back!

reviewReply.comment: Hi Sabrina, Thank you so much for sharing your incredible PRP experience! We're thrilled to hear that from the detailed explanations to the gentle care, you felt comfortable and well looked after throughout your session. The LED light therapy is indeed a perfect finishing touch, and we‚Äôre so happy your skin is already feeling firmer and radiant. Your recommendation means the world to us, and we can‚Äôt wait to welcome you back for more luxurious treatments soon! - Cocoon Team

reviews.name: accounts/109616517437403268640/locations/5135673551050654657/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNZbHIyckt3EAE

reviews.comment:
I recently indulged in the 24K Gold Facial at Cocoon Medical Spa, and it was nothing short of exceptional. The treatment began with a thorough cleansing and deep exfoliation, followed by a brightening and hydration infusion using ultrasound technology. The radiofrequency session for skin tightening and LED red light therapy for rejuvenation left my skin feeling revitalized. The highlight was the gold collagen mask infused with 24K gold hyaluronic acid serum, which gave my skin a radiant glow. The session concluded with the application of Cocoon's peptide, hyaluronic acid, and collagen skincare products.

The staff were professional and attentive, ensuring a comfortable and relaxing experience throughout. The spa's serene ambiance added to the overall sense of luxury. If you're in Bali and seeking a top-tier facial treatment, I highly recommend Cocoon Medical Spa. Their range of services, from IV drips to advanced facials, caters to various wellness needs.

reviewReply.comment: Hi Karina, Thank you so much for your incredible review! We‚Äôre so glad you enjoyed the 24K Gold Facial and that every step of the treatment left your skin glowing and revitalized. It‚Äôs wonderful to hear that our team made your experience both comfortable and luxurious. We truly appreciate your recommendation and are thrilled to know you‚Äôre satisfied with the results. We look forward to welcoming you back for more rejuvenating treatments at Cocoon! -Cocoon Team

reviews.comment:
I went to the Cocoon medical spa center for a hydrocolon therapy treatment. It was my first time, and obviously there was some apprehension, but Lady from the front desk staff was very welcoming.
Nurse Kathleen who followed me through the treatment was professional, welcoming and attentive to my needs, so much so that I felt comfortable and forgot about my slight apprehension, the treatment was perfect and absolutely pain free.
I was given all the appropriate attention with subsequent adjuvant drinks and necessary recommendations for continuation.
I also thank Miranda from the back office Who assisted me in the booking process and the follow up.

Thank you all for a pleasant experience that I want to repeat.

reviewReply.comment: Hi Laura, Thank you so much for your detailed and kind review! We're thrilled to hear that your first hydrocolon therapy experience was comfortable and positive. Lady, Nurse Kathleen, and Miranda will be so happy to know they helped put you at ease and made the entire process smooth and supportive. We're grateful for your trust and look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit! -Cocoon Team
